Features Presentation Section.Layout: Single-column structure with a centered introduction followed by a multi-column grid of features.
Features Presentation Section.Design: Clean, organized, and modern. Focuses on presenting multiple features with icons, headings, descriptions, and links.

Key Elements.Section Header: Centered heading and subheading providing an overview of the features.
Key Elements.Feature Grid: Grid layout for displaying individual features, adaptable to different screen sizes (2 columns on small screens, 3 columns on larger screens).
Key Elements.Feature Items: Each feature includes an icon, a heading, a short description, and a link for more information.

Features Presentation Section.Use Cases: Ideal for showcasing a product's or service's key features, benefits, or advantages. Suitable for tech companies, SaaS products, and services highlighting multiple attributes.
